General.Name: Provident Agro Tbk
General.Description: PT Provident Investasi Bersama Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the operation of palm oil plantations in Indonesia. It develops plantation through land processing, seeding, nursery, planting, maintenance, and harvesting of fresh fruit bunch; processes fresh fruit bunch into crude palm oil and palm kernel; and sells and trades in plantation products. The company operates a total planted area of approximately 6.295 hectares. It also engages in the trading activities. The company was formerly known as PT Provident Agro Tbk and changed its name to PT Provident Investasi Bersama Tbk in September 2022. PT Provident Investasi Bersama Tbk was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
